name: La Finca - La Finca - Joyas
additionalNotes:
First introduced in 1972, La Finca cigars have established themselves as one of our oldest and most trusted premium Nicaraguan brands. The original La Finca blend that stood alone for many decades features a dark reddish hue Ecuadorian wrapper embracing the finest aged Nicaraguan binder and long filler 
In the early 2000â€™s La Finca cigar teamed up with its distant European cousin, La Finca Europa. This original Frank Llaneza blend, the famed master blender behind such legendary Cuban heritage brands as Hoyo de Monterrey, Punch, and El Rey del Mundo, boasts a silky, golden brown Ecuador Connecticut wrapper, a Sumatra binder, and aged Nicaraguan filler tobaccos. Although mellower than the original, the Europa still has plenty of character and tons of rich medium bodied flavors that includes cocoa, roasted nuts, cedar, sweet spice, and caramel. Tierra Brava cigars, the latest La Finca installment, brings the very first Nicaraguan puro blend to the lineup. Laced with the finest aged Cuban-seed tobaccos these medium bodied gems produce woodsy
